attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inflation: fuel and food rises are spiraling

Economy: Banks are on their marks... get ready... BANG

and Brown is proving to be as much of a leader as Major during this crisis. Time for him to move on before he skuttles Brittania.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
